Name: Polygone
About the game: Arcade Mode Play with your friends or fight against them. Team up in Arcade Mode to collect powerups and fight waves of bosses. 1-4 Players, local-coop (or AI substitutes) Battle Mode Fight it out in Battle Mode to be the last one standing. Use stage hazards to your advantage. 2-4 Players, local-coop (or AI substitutes) Challenge Mode Looking for a challenge? Try Challenge mode to survive the game's hardest difficulty. 1 Player Penelope Mode Have a younger player 2? Penelope mode brings a casual setting and an emphasis on letter-shaped asteroids. 1-4 Players, local-coop
